short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An utils tool for decoding S2iCode

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This application is an online S2iCode decoding tools with which the user can upload a S2iCode image for authentication.

S2iCode is a security 2D barcode, which has the ability against counterfeiting.
